title: Luxurious 3 Bedroom Apartment for Sale in Nawala
details:

Luxurious 3 Bedroom Apartment for Sale in Nawala

- Unfurnished (Furniture can be given at a cost)
- Brand New Apartment
- 1700 sqft with balcony space
- 3 Bedrooms
- 1 Master bedroom with attached washroom
- 1 common washroom for the other two bedrooms
- Living and Dining Area with spectacular waterfront views
- Kitchen with pantry
- Servant's room with separate washroom and entrance
- 01 Parking slot
- Very good breeze and light

Facilities

- Backup generator to power all the apartments
- Common are solar powered
- 24 hour security
- Swimming Pool
- Gymnasium

WHY INVEST in this complex?

- Excellent and strategic location with easy access
- 6 minute walk or 2 minute drive to Keells Super and 3 minute drive to Food City
- 4 minutes drive to Asiri Surgical, Ninewells and Oasis Hospitals
- 8 minutes to Lanka Hospital and Asiri Hospital on Kirula Road
- less than a 10 minute drive from British School, Elizabeth Moir Junior and Senior Schools,
CIS and Gateway College and less than 15 minutes drive away from schools in
Bambalapitiya, Kollupitiya and Cinnamon Gardens
- Close to main educational institutions
- Close to medical hub
- Breathtaking panoramic views of the nature reserve
- High quality finishes with well designed, efficient and
functional layouts that caters from young professionals,
families to retirees.
- Huge professional tenant market and excellent potential for
a good rental yield.

Price of the property - LKR 40 Million
